name: Enterprise Architecture CoE
description: An EA Center of Excellence in a large banking organization.

name: Architecture Governance
description: Establish and enforce architecture standards and policies.

name: Technology Assessment
description: Evaluate and recommend technologies to support business needs.

name: Portfolio Management
description: Manage and prioritize architecture initiatives and projects.

name: Stakeholder Engagement
description: Facilitate communication and collaboration with business stakeholders.

name: Training and Enablement
description: Provide training programs to enhance architectural skills across the organization.
